Package repast.simphony.ui

Class RunOptionsModel

java.lang.Object
repast.simphony.ui.RunOptionsModel
public class RunOptionsModel extends Object
Model for getting and setting pause, end times, and sparkline length via the gui.
Author:
Nick Collier
